title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unit sales in millions, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Unit sales in millions has increased over the Year
Unit sales in millions is rapidly increasing from 2014 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Unit sales in millions about 21.15 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Unit sales in millions about 0.83 was recorded at Year 2014
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unit sales in millions with a total of 5 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 2018 to 2014.
